item.title: Multi-threading programming in C# notes
item.description: Thread safety removes the following conditions in the code: Race condition occurs when two threads access a shared variable at the same time. The first thread reads the variable, and the second thread writes to the same variable at the same time. Deadlock case happens in concurrent or multi-threaded environment. It is kind of a situation in which two or more competing threads or tasks wait for the other task to finish and they never finish.
